title: Algorithmic tasks
tooltip: Solving algorithmic problems on daily basis will hel you develop logical thinking and teach you how to find solutions to practical problems.

title: Lesson
tooltip: Review of new material with a coach in live mode

title: Practice
tooltip: Independent work with new material, mastering the theoretical part and performing practical tasks.

title: Q&A
tooltip: Video call with mentor, during which you will sort out common mistakes and get help in completing practical tasks.

title: Mock interview
tooltip: Test interview with a mentor and coach, which will prepare you for a real interview and show you what knowledge needs to be improved.
